page.title: 04CLUBS AND ORGANISATIONS
page.content: In Auchnagatt you will never see a night-club or an Athletics club because the population is not big enough.Most of the clubs that there are in Auchnagatt are held in the Village Hall. On Mondays there is the Playgroup 4y-5y all year round 9.30-11.30am. On Tuesdays there is Mother+Toddler all year round 9.30-11.30 and the Whist club for adults 8-10pm. On Wednesdays there is the playgroup 3y-5y 9.30-11.30 and the bowling (OCT.MAR 6.30-8.00 8.30-10.00) Barons Football team play on Wednesday evenings. On Thursday there is the W.R.I. 2nd Thursday of every month (7.30-9.30) There are also Brownies & Guides held on Tuesdays (7.00pm-8.30pm at the school.
